name: OverGrown (itch) (Sezotove)
description:
OverGrown - Godot Wild Jam # 36

Cut the lawns of this island and earn yourself some cash! Beware, the fauna growth on this island is pretty insane so pay attention! The inspector does his job...most of the times and will fine you and cause your rating to go down! Make sure you've cleared at least 50% of the tiles or you'll get fined!

Go as many rounds as you can and Retire the company when you're done. Submit your high scores and see how you placed!

It's recommended to play the download version for performance reasons.

Controls

-WASD to move

-SPACE to pause.

Theme - Uncontrollable Growth

Grass tiles grow at a random rate and weeds grown on top .

If it rains the growth is increased and very hard to keep up with!

You can purchase weed killer to stall the growth rate, but Mother Nature always prevails!

Wildcards
  • Competitive Spirit - Online Leaderboard included. It mostly works with ~10 scores.Bugs
  • After trying to close the leaderboard, it will not restart the game. IDK why yet. 
  • Sometimes the Leaderboard has an issue iterating through more than 10 scores. IDK why yet either. 
  • In game controls state E to do something. It does not, i forgot to remove it.

Currently the bugs are from SilentWolf addon, but I'm sure I'm doing something wrong.
